words.definition: A general direction in which something is developing.
words.arabic_definition: الاتجاه العام الذي يتطور فيه شيء ما.

example.en: The trend towards online shopping is growing.
example.ar: الاتجاه نحو التسوق عبر الإنترنت ينمو.

words.definition: A place where goods are bought and sold.
words.arabic_definition: مكان يتم فيه شراء وبيع السلع.

example.en: The market for smartphones is very competitive.

words.definition: A new method, idea, or product.

example.en: Innovation is vital for business growth.

words.definition: The desire of people to buy a service or goods.
words.arabic_definition: رغبة الأشخاص في شراء خدمة أو سلعة.

example.en: There is a high demand for electric cars.
example.ar: هناك طلب كبير على السيارات الكهربائية.

words.definition: A person who buys goods or services.

example.en: The consumer is looking for quality and affordability.
example.ar: المستهلك يبحث عن الجودة والسعر المناسب.

words.definition: Increase in the size or value of a business.

example.en: The company is experiencing rapid growth.

words.definition: Decrease in the size or value of a business.

example.en: The sales of this product are in decline.

words.definition: A person or company that sells the same products.
words.arabic_definition: شخص أو شركة تبيع نفس المنتجات.

example.en: We have many strong competitors in this market.
example.ar: لدينا العديد من المنافسين الأقوياء في هذا السوق.

example.en: The global market is very challenging.

words.definition: The action of putting money into a business for profit.
words.arabic_definition: فعل وضع المال في عمل للحصول على ربح.

example.en: Investment in technology is increasing every year.
example.ar: الاستثمار في التكنولوجيا يزيد كل عام.
